Resetting the EVB-A in BL ModeÔÉÅ

To reset the EVB-A in Boot Loader mode, click on Reset in BL Mode.

When the EVB-A is reset in the Boot Loader mode, though no changes are observed in the console for this command, the board is reset.

Figure 25: Reset in BL mode
